description.message: New features of SoundCloud Widget: track info notifications, easy player control, listened-to tracks list.

limitationsDisclaimer.message: This module is meant for SoundCloud Widget only, it doesn't work on soundcloud.com itself (for soundcloud.com, use PoziTone itself).

readme.message: Learn more

soundcloudCopyright.message: SoundCloud is a trademark of SoundCloud Ltd.

pozitoneModuleSdkConnectStatusCode404.message: This extension requires PoziTone to be installed to work properly. Make sure PoziTone is installed, then try again.
